content.en: GFR Estimation Algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the accuracy of different algorithms in estimating glomerular filtration rate (GFR) in patients with chronic kidney disease. These algorithms, based on plasma concentrations of cystatin C and other factors such as age and nutritional status, aim to replace existing prediction equations. The studies compare the performance of various equations, such as the Modification of Diet in Renal Disease (MDRD) and the Chronic Kidney Disease Epidemiology Collaboration (CKD-EPI), to determine which provides the most accurate estimation of GFR in different populations.
content.da: Estimationsalgoritmer for GFR: Forskere har undersøgt nøjagtigheden af forskellige algoritmer til at estimere glomerulær filtrationshastighed (GFR) hos patienter med kronisk nyresygdom. Disse algoritmer, baseret på plasmakoncentrationer af cystatin C og andre faktorer såsom alder og ernæringsstatus, sigter mod at erstatte eksisterende forudsigelsesligninger. Studierne sammenligner ydeevnen af forskellige ligninger, såsom Modification of Diet in Renal Disease (MDRD) og Chronic Kidney Disease Epidemiology Collaboration (CKD-EPI), for at afgøre, hvilken der giver den mest nøjagtige estimering af GFR i forskellige befolkningsgrupper.
